ValidationRule.description: This validation rule makes sure that all the fields in the address info is filled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ((RecordTypeId = '012800000002C4g' || RecordTypeId = '012800000003YRm' || RecordTypeId = '012800000003YRh' || RecordTypeId = '012800000003YRc' ), (ISBLANK( PersonMailingCity ) || ISBLANK( PersonMailingState ) || ISBLANK( PersonMailingStreet ) || ISBLANK( PersonMailingPostalCode) || ISBLANK( PersonMailingCountry)),(PersonMailingCountry="US"|| PersonMailingCountry="GU"|| PersonMailingCountry="PR"|| PersonMailingCountry="BM"|| PersonMailingCountry="VI"|| PersonMailingCountry="CA"))
